revision.text:
{{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Chivacoa (Venezuela) |nickname = |motto = Cuna de Maria Lionza |image_skyline = Estatua de María Lionza en Chivacoa, Yaracuy, Venezuela..JPG |image_caption = |image_flag = Bandera Bruzual.jpg |image_seal = Escudo Bruzual.jpg | pushpin_map = Venezuela |subdivision_type = [[Countries of the world|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[States of Venezuela|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Municipalities of Venezuela|Municipality]] |subdivision_name = {{flagicon|Venezuela}}[[Venezuela]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Yaracuy]] |subdivision_name2 = Bruzual |established_title = Founded |established_date = 11 February 1695 |established_title2 = |established_date2 = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |area_total_km2 = 417 |population_as_of = |population_footnotes = |population_total = 59,059 |population_density_km2 = |timezone = [[Venezuelan Standard Time Zone|VST]] |utc_offset = |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = {{coord|10|9|36|N|68|54|35|W|region:VE-R|display=inline,title}} |elevation_footnotes= |elevation_m = 296 |population_blank1_title = [[Demonym]] |population_blank1 = Chivacoeño/a |blank1_name = [[Köppen climate classification|Climate]] |blank1_info = [[Tropical savanna climate|Aw]] |area_code = |postal_code_type = Postal code |postal_code = 3202 |website = [http://bruzual-yaracuy.gob.ve/ bruzual-yaracuy.gob.ve]{{dead link|date=August 2017 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}{{in lang|es}} |footnotes = }} '''Chivacoa''' is a city in [[Yaracuy]], [[Venezuela]]. It has a population of about 60,000. This town is very famous by Mystic Rituals in Sorte Mountain. [[Maria Lionza]]. Their Carnival Party is also famous. It was officially founded in 1695 by the Spanish, but was preceded by a native settlement of the [[Caquetio people]].
[[File:Plaza Bolívar de Chivacoa.jpg|left|thumb|Chivacoa's Plaza Bolívar]]
[[Category:Cities in Yaracuy]] [[Category:Populated places established in 1695]] [[Category:1695 establishments in the Spanish Empire]]
